circumstances: Few minutes after takeoff from Hoskins, while cruising in poor weather conditions, the twin engine aircraft went out of control and crashed in a palm plantation located near Hoskins. The aircraft was destroyed and all 11 occupants were killed. At the time of the accident, weather conditions were poor with thunderstorm activity and severe turbulences. §
probable_cause: It is believed that the aircraft suffered a structural failure due to severe turbulences while flying in bad weather conditions.
